vlive.korean: 창의력 퀴즈가 뭡니까? - 창의력 퀴즈가 뭐야? What's this? - Creativity quiz? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.94

vlive.korean: [타의 추종을 불허하는 이 창의력... 당장 루브르로 모셔] 이거! [He's so creative. His work deserves to be in Louvre] This! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 🎨역시!! 무대미술과!! 그림으로 말하는 게 거의 웅변대회 대상급!!🏆 (DAEHWI’s drawing quiz)

vlive.english: [Team Yellow is not confident with the creativity quiz] Can we say pass?

vlive.korean: [창의력 걍 미쳤음] 뭔가 그런 식으로 힌트를 주시지 않나요? [So creative] Isn't that how he gives out hints? 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 그렇게 어렵다는 JYP 남돌 춤을 동시에 춰보았다 #GOT7 #StrayKids #DAY6 [이세퀴] 시즌2 EP.06
vlive.english: [So creative] Isn't that how he gives out hints?

examples.korean: His illness had not stunted his creativity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 질병도 그의 창의력을 저해하지는 못했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His illness had not stunted his creativity. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They hope the new rules will not stifle creativity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 새 규칙이 창의력을 억압하지 않기를 바란다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
